item.title: Joy add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "No need to hurry. No need to sparkle. No need to be anybody but oneself." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "What should I do about the wild and the tame? The wild heart that wants to be free, and the tame heart that wants to come home. I want to be held. I don't want you to come too close. I want you to scoop me up and bring me home at nights. I don't want to tell you where I am. I want to keep a place among the rocks where no one can find me. I want to be with you." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Joy add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "All good things are wild and free." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Joy add a quote by Truman Capote
Joy add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "A prayer for the wild at heart kept in cages." -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Joy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To a dull mind all of nature is leaden. To the illumined mind the whole world burns and sparkles with light." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Joy add a quote by Marie Beynon Lyons Ray
item.description: "Begin doing what you want to do now. We are not living in eternity. We have only this moment, sparkling like a star in our hand - and melting like a snowflake. Let us use it before it is too late." -- Marie Beynon Lyons Ray

item.title: Joy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If you're gonna be two-faced at least make one of them pretty." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Joy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The one you love and the one who loves you are never, ever the same person." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Joy add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "A children's story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children's story in the slightest." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Joy add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Joy add a quote by Chris Rock
item.description: "You know the world is going crazy when the best rapper is a white guy, the best golfer is a black guy, the tallest guy in the NBA is Chinese, the Swiss hold the America's Cup, France is accusing the U.S. of arrogance, Germany doesn't want to go to war, and the three most powerful men in America are named "Bush", "Dick", and "Colin." Need I say more?" -- Chris Rock

item.title: Joy add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Joy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "She was a girl who knew how to be happy even when she was sad. And that’s important—you know " -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jonathan Swift
item.description: "May you live every day of your life." -- Jonathan Swift

item.title: Joy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's not true that I had nothing on. I had the radio on." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Joy add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Kiss me, and you will see how important I am." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Joy add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Joy add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Si quelqu'un aime une fleur qui n'existe qu'à un exemplaire dans les millions et les millions d'étoiles, ça suffit pour qu'il soit heureux quand il les regarde." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Joy add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "I like too many things and get all confused and hung-up running from one falling star to another till i drop. This is the night, what it does to you. I had nothing to offer anybody except my own confusion." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Live, travel, adventure, bless, and don't be sorry." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "My fault, my failure, is not in the passions I have, but in my lack of control of them." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "There was nowhere to go but everywhere, so just keep on rolling under the stars." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "I don't know, I don't care, and it doesn't make any difference." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Something good will come of all things yet" -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "As far as I'm concerned the only thing to do is sit in a room and get drunk" -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Maybe that's what life is... a wink of the eye and winking stars. " -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "I like too many things and get all confused and hung-up running from one falling star to another til I drop." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Joy add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "The empty blue sky of space says 'All this comes back to me, then goes again, and comes back again, then goes again, and I don't care, it still belongs to me" -- Jack Kerouac
